This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"refundUnusedGas(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_merchant":"Merchant address","_refundAmount":"Amount to refund"}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. returns.reasons: Array of rejection reasons (empty if sponsorable)

batchExecuteSponsorship(address[],uint25.details: Skips merchants that fail validation rather than reverting

returns.statuses: Array of active status for each merchant
returns.tiers_: Array of tier IDs for each merchant

params._tierIds: Array of tier IDs for each merchant

returns.maxPerDay_: Array of max per day limits
returns.maxPerMonth_: Array of max per month limits
returns.maxPerTx: Array of max per transaction limits

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

batchCanSponsor(address[],uint256[]).notice: Check if multiple merchants can be sponsored for given amounts

batchExecuteSponsorship(address[],uint25.notice: Execute sponsorship for multiple merchants in a single transaction

batchGetMerchantDetails(address[]).notice: Get comprehensive details for multiple merchants

batchGetMerchantStatus(address[]).notice: Get sponsorship status for multiple merchants

batchGetRemainingDailyAllowance(address[.notice: Get remaining daily allowances for multiple merchants

batchRefundUnusedGas(address[],uint256[].notice: Batch refund unused gas for multiple merchants

batchSponsorMerchants(address[],uint256[.notice: Sponsor multiple merchants in a single transaction

canSponsor(address,uint256).notice: Check if a merchant can be sponsored for an amount

executeSponsorship(address,uint256,uint8.notice: Execute gas sponsorship for a merchant

operators(address).notice: Operator addresses that can execute sponsorships
